do this five or six times then rest and

this breath awakens the electrical

chapter 7 the immaculate birth

law
he who believes in the law comes into

this dawn of a new creation in the body

consciousness
the extended mind first reached out to

mind and body are one wings for the

we may borrow their wings to find the

when man has once conceived the true

through his material

true clairvoyance not the mixed colors

before him at his own will he can spread

and joined with the extended vision he

the true message and register the music

his presence heals his hands carry

his words gain a new meaning they do not

his emanation mind becomes a wireless

he can suspend his own thinking for a
